name: GlouGlouBot
description:
// Game made for the 109 edition of the mini-jam, more details at the end

In this game you control a bot underwater named "GlouGlouBot" and your objective is to exterminate a quickly spreading parasite, how much points can you gather?

You will have to mine ressources and upgrade your bot to increase your chances of surviving and having a better score

Good luck ^^

// This game was made for the 109 edition of the mini jam

// The theme was "Depths"

// The limitation was "health is a tool"

Chiptone was used for some sounds: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

shop music:

And the sand texture was stolen on google images (woops)
